column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Such a a nice location
column3: and ambiance. The pizza was good and served with care
column4: but I think it didn't live up to the deep dish hype. The crust was a bit soggy and without taste
column5: and most of the cheese falls off as you pull a slice. I definitely recommend for the historic value
column6: and quality since prices are fair and portions are filling.
